hr.fer.oop.lab3

Class NationalTeam

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.oop.lab3.Team
      • hr.fer.oop.lab3.NationalTeam
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ManageableTeam

    public class NationalTeam
extends Team
    This class represents football national teams, with the name of the team, its formation and country name. Maximum number of allowed registered players for the national team is 23.
    Author:
    karlo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NationalTeam()
      Constructs a new object of type NationalTeam
      NationalTeam(java.lang.String name, Formation formation, java.lang.String country)
      Constructs a new object of type NationalTeam.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calculateRating()
      Calculates and returns the national team's rating with the following formula:
      30% skill + 70% emotion
      java.lang.String getCountry()
      Returns the national team's country.
      boolean registerPlayer(FootballPlayer player)
      If a team is a national team, a player need to have the same country as a national team; whereas if a team is a club team, a player needs to have player skill which is higher or equal to club's reputation (note: in either case player registration will be successful if there is a space for a player)

      • Methods inherited from class hr.fer.oop.lab3.Team

        addPlayerToStartingEleven, clearStartingEleven, getFormation, getName, getRegisteredPlayers, getStartingEleven, isPlayerRegistered, setFormation

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • NationalTeam

        public NationalTeam(java.lang.String name,
                    Formation formation,
                    java.lang.String country)
        Constructs a new object of type NationalTeam. All variables in this type must be initialized when calling a constructor. Variables name, and country are unchangeable after calling this constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the national football team
        formation - formation of the national football team
        country - national team country

        public boolean registerPlayer(FootballPlayer player)
        Description copied from interface: ManageableTeam
        If a team is a national team, a player need to have the same country as a national team; whereas if a team is a club team, a player needs to have player skill which is higher or equal to club's reputation (note: in either case player registration will be successful if there is a space for a player)
        Specified by:

        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
